title: PlayStation Domination: So Much News! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.26.22
description:
Greg and Tim saddle up to the mics to talk about a bevy of PlayStation news! God of War Ragnarok looks to be coming in 2022! Horizon and God of War TV news! Lots of Jim Ryan quotes!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Podcast with Ron Funches is live! Find out what’s up with Nick’s eye and how Ron gave 40 people diaherra!
The Kinda Funny Tik Tok keeps on Tiking and Toking. Head over to @kindafunnygames to see Mike throw his controller across the room playing Switch Sports and Roger review HBO Max's Winning Time! Make sure to follow for daily KF clips.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Anonymous & FargoBrady
The Roper Report  -
00:09:01 - God of War Ragnarok Inches Closer to 2022 Launch, Ryan Disdale @ IGN
00:22:13 - Two more live service games from PlayStation this Fiscal Year, Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:27:58 - Sony wants around half its games to be on PC and mobile by 2025, Jon Porter @ The Verge
00:32:25 - Sony Expects To Make $300 Million From PC Releases This Year, Eddie Mack-oh @ GameSpot:: - Sony Expects To Make $300 Million From PC Releases This Year, Eddie Mack-oh @ GameSpot
00:34:22 - Steam listing suggests Returnal is coming to PC, Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:43:30 - Ad
00:52:20 - UPDATE on PlayStation Plus Debacle, AskPlayStation
00:53:45 - Fortnite Finale Imminent
00:56:05 - Stray Release Date?
00:57:30 - Out today
01:01:56 - Squad Up:Frankfurtter(Mobile/PC)
01:02:58 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
